EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Transferring from the Minister of Health to the Minister of the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency the Control and Supervision of the portion of the federal public administration known as the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency and Ordering the Minister of the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency to Preside over the Agency

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, effective July 15, 2013,

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph 2(a)a of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Actb, transfers to the Minister of the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency from the Minister of Health the control and supervision of that portion of the federal public administration known as the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: orders that the Minister of the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency shall preside over the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency.
